attributes.action: Request to Suspend water bill due to current situation of Epidemic Novel Covid19
attributes.additional_details: Help people in this crisis period by suspending the charges for water. All supply companies to suspend their charges.
attributes.background: Water Bill to be suspended till the Epidemic covid 19 is Contained.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
